text.p: These are the leading stories in the Mozambican press on Monday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.

- A 19-year-old Portuguese citizen, Francisco Jose Silva e Sousa, is in a coma following a brutal assault, apparently by Mozambican soldiers, in Maputo early on Sunday. Armed forces chief of staff Lagos Lidimo ordered an immediate inquiry.

- The 12-nation Southern African Development Community's Theatre Festival opened in Maputo at the weekend. Audiences were appreciative, even for shows in English, a language spoken by few Mozambicans.
